publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-390 Donald Gorrie: Statements to Media—That the Parliament establishes a convention that all statements to the media on behalf of the Parliament, any of its Committees, the Executive, a political party group, an individual MSP or a group of MSPs must have the name of the MSPs or official making the statement attached to it.

S1M-390# Donald Gorrie: Statements to Media—That the Parliament establishes a convention that all statements to the media on behalf of the Parliament, any of its Committees, the Executive, a political party group, an individual MSP or a group of MSPs must have the name of the MSP or official making the statement attached to them.
S1M-390# Statements to Media (lodged on 15 December 1999) Ms Margo MacDonald*, Mr David Davidson*
S1M-390# Statements to Media (lodged on 15 December 1999) Nick Johnston*

S1M-390# Donald Gorrie: Statements to Media—That the Parliament establishes a convention that all statements to the media on behalf of the Parliament, any of its Committees, the Executive, a political party group, an individual MSP or a group of MSPs must have the name of the MSP or official making the statement attached to them. Supported by: Ms Margo MacDonald, Mr David Davidson, Nick Johnston
S1M-390# Statements to Media (lodged on 15 December 1999) Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-390# Statements to Media (lodged on 15 December 1999) Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-390# Statements to Media (lodged on 15 December 1999) Fergus Ewing*

S1M-390# Donald Gorrie: Statements to Media—That the Parliament establishes a convention that all statements to the media on behalf of the Parliament, any of its Committees, the Executive, a political party group, an individual MSP or a group of MSPs must have the name of the MSP or official making the statement attached to them. Supported by: Ms Margo MacDonald, Mr David Davidson, Nick Johnston, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Gil Paterson, Fergus Ewing
S1M-390# Statements to Media (lodged on 15 December 1999) Mr Brian Monteith*
S1M-390# Statements to Media (lodged on 15 December 1999) Nora Radcliffe*

S1M-390# Donald Gorrie: Statements to Media—That the Parliament establishes a convention that all statements to the media on behalf of the Parliament, any of its Committees, the Executive, a political party group, an individual MSP or a group of MSPs must have the name of the MSP or official making the statement attached to them. Supported by: Ms Margo MacDonald, Mr David Davidson, Nick Johnston, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Gil Paterson, Fergus Ewing, Mr Brian Monteith, Nora Radcliffe
S1M-390# Statements to Media (lodged on 15 December 1999) Christine Grahame*

S1M-390# Donald Gorrie: Statements to Media—That the Parliament establishes a convention that all statements to the media on behalf of the Parliament, any of its Committees, the Executive, a political party group, an individual MSP or a group of MSPs must have the name of the MSP or official making the statement attached to them. Supported by: Ms Margo MacDonald, Mr David Davidson, Nick Johnston, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Gil Paterson, Fergus Ewing, Mr Brian Monteith, Nora Radcliffe, Christine Grahame

S1M-390# Donald Gorrie: Statements to Media—That the Parliament establishes a convention that all statements to the media on behalf of the Parliament, any of its Committees, the Executive, a political party group, an individual MSP or a group of MSPs must have the name of the MSP or official making the statement attached to them. Supported by: Ms Margo MacDonald, Mr David Davidson, Nick Johnston, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Gil Paterson, Fergus Ewing, Mr Brian Monteith, Nora Radcliffe, Christine Grahame
